alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Southeast Middlesex; Suffolk; Western Essex (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 2:06PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Essex, northeastern Suffolk and east central Middlesex Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 206 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Danvers, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Lynn, Malden, Revere, Peabody, Salem, Beverly, Gloucester, North Andover, Melrose, Saugus, Danvers, Wakefield, Marblehead, Newburyport, North Reading, Swampscott, Ipswich, Lynnfield, Middleton and Boxford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 PM EDT for northeastern Massachusetts.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Southeast Middlesex; Suffolk; Western Essex
